values: He Believed and Confessed: Funeral Meditation for Carl SchmulandHe Believed and Confessed: Funeral Meditation for Carl Schmuland

No matter how great our sins have been, if we confess with our mouth that Jesus is Lord and believe in our heart that God raised him from the dead, we will be saved.No matter how great our sins have been, if we confess with our mouth that Jesus is Lord and believe in our heart that God raised him from the dead, we will be saved.
